name: Config Europe Companion
description:
Since we can’t meet each other in person, we took some of our favorite parts of IRL conferences and recreated them virtually… in Figma, of course.


The Conference Companion is an extension of Config Europe before, during, and after the conference. You can go at it alone or create one file for a group of people attending (we suggest a group - conferences are more fun with friends!) 


This file includes:

  • Nametag: A template to make your nametag to share it with other attendees
  • Agenda: A customizable agenda for you and your team (there are 4 tracks!) 
  • Notes & Takeaways: A way to keep track of what you learned so you can share with your team and the community


Don’t forget to share your name tag & takeaways on Twitter with the hashtag #ConfigEurope.
